info.name: Align Reads using Bowtie2 v2.3.2
info.subtitle: Align sequencing reads to long reference prokaryotic genome sequences using Bowtie2
info.tooltip: Align sequencing reads to long reference prokaryotic genome sequences using Bowtie2

parameters.short_hint: Select the RNA-seq SampleSet or ReadsSet. If you have only one sample of RNA-seq reads, select the corresponding library object.
Select the assembly or genome on which to align to
Provide the suffix used for the output reads alignment set name

parameters.description: phred33 is used by Illumina starting with v1.8
parameters.short_hint: Select the quality score type depending on the sequencing platform

parameters.description: By default, Bowtie2 performs end-to-end read alignment. It searches for alignments involving all of read characters. For local option, it can clip some read characters from one or both ends of the alignment to maximize the alignment score.
Trim the base-pairs from 5' end before alignment, if needed. By default, it is 0.
parameters.short_hint: Trim the base-pairs from 5' (left) end of each read before alignment

parameters.description: Trim the base-pairs from 3' end before alignment, if needed. By default, it is 0.
parameters.short_hint: Trim the base-pairs from 3' (right) end of each read before alignment
Sets the penalty for positions where the read, reference, or both, contain an ambiguous character such as N.

parameters.description: Faster option is generally less sensitive and vice versa.
parameters.short_hint: Select the preset options based on alignment type
Select the minimum fragment length for valid untrimmed paired-end alignments
parameters.ui_name: Minimum Fragment Length For Paired-end Alignments

parameters.short_hint: Select the maximum fragment length for valid untrimmed paired-end alignments
parameters.ui_name: Maximum Fragment Length For Paired-end Alignments

parameters.short_hint: Select the upstream/downstream mate orientations for a valid paired-end alignments against the forward reference strand.
If you run on a single Reads Library, and want to specify a condition label in the alignment, set this paramter
parameters.ui_name: Condition Label for Single Library Run

parameters.short_hint: Individual alignments will be given names based on the reads object name appended with this extension

attributes.subtitle: Align sequencing reads to long reference prokaryotic genome sequences using Bowtie2
attributes.title: Align Reads using Bowtie2 v2.3.2

cells.source:
from biokbase.narrative.jobs.appmanager import AppManager
AppManager().run_app(
    "kb_Bowtie2/align_reads_using_bowtie2",
    {
        "input_ref": "33192/2;15/44/1",
        "assembly_or_genome_ref": "rhodobacter-genome",
        "output_obj_name_suffix": "_alignment_set",
        "quality_score": "phred33",
        "alignment_type": "end-to-end",
        "trim5": 0,
        "trim3": 0,
        "np": 1,
        "preset_options": "",
        "minins": 0,
        "maxins": 500,
        "orientation": "",
        "condition_label": "unknown",
        "output_alignment_suffix": "_alignment"
    },
    tag="dev",
    version="88e0322e81f5c00bebe5a6411ed56866eef55af0",
    cell_id="032690ce-5855-4b9c-98b0-89a1b8506d67",
    run_id="26653cb8-f1cd-436d-ba72-9be77a63ee97"
)
